nodes.excerpt: Muhstik is a malware that originally started as a variant of the QNAPCrypt ransomware in October 2019, and was later outfitted with additional attacks for bruteforcing SSH, Wordpress and Drupal credentials, and a few other tools. Exploited devices…

nodes.excerpt: On December 5th, 2019, more than 250 million customer support services records dating back to 2005 were exposed due to misconfigured access controls for five Elasticsearch databases.  Bob Diachenko  discovered these exposed systems on December 29th…
